headline: In Chicago, Obama Aims to Resurrect a Movement
description: Barack Obama headlines the Democratic convention in Chicago, seeking to bolster Kamala Harris's campaign and warn against a Donald Trump presidency.
newsletter_headline: In Chicago, Obama Aims to Resurrect a Movement
newsletter_sub_hed: Also, Biden approved a secret new nuclear strategy. Here’s the latest at the end of Tuesday.

headline: Israel said it had recovered the bodies of six hostages
description: Israel's defense minister announced that forces recovered the bodies of six hostages from Hamas tunnels in southern Gaza, with five already known to have died in captivity.

headline: Biden approved a secret new nuclear strategy
description: President Biden approved a classified nuclear strategic plan focusing on China's nuclear arsenal and preparing for possible coordinated nuclear challenges from China, Russia, and North Korea.

headline: A search is underway for survivors of a sunken yacht
description: Deep-sea divers continue searching for six missing passengers, including British tech mogul Mike Lynch, after a yacht sank off Sicily's coast during a storm, with 15 rescued and one body recovered.
